storyInfo: The Shieldguards make a deal with Rhodes Island, but Rosmontis's squad is ambushed in the sealing layer's superstructure. It is unknown if they survived. In desperation, Rosmontis uses her Arts to destroy the sealing layer.

attributes.content: What does all of that... mean?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: 'Rhodes Island, we invite you to fight with us.'
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: That's what I said.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: I only speak Ursine. You also asked me in Ursine, so you should have understood.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: You know these Chernobog industrial machines much better than us, yes? You must have had a lot more training in such things than we have. We're better fighters.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: If you want into the tower, you must have a plan to shut down this thing too. You can't let it close the way.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: We need to split our guerrilla forces, sending at least three quarters of our men to protect the Infected around the city, or they're doomed.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Reunion under Talulah is out of control. We've seen enough revenge killings in Chernobog.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Even with just a fourth of our full strength, we have what it takes to beat Talulah's stupid guards. But...
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: We could use some help right now. We'd be able to better capitalize on our victories if we had it.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Our Originium Altars are down. The devils are handy in a fight, but they've got nothing on the Captain's legendary strength.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: We need more firepower.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Who calls the shots for you? Is it the Cautus? Or the Feline? You're both plenty strong, you could handle it.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: You'll have to ask Amiya. I'm just an operator.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Cautus, what do you say?
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Sir, what matters is if your Reunion is still dedicated to helping the Infected.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: As long as it's not some Infected Ursus political project... we'll proudly agree.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But... I'm worried...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: About what?
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: There are still a lot of open wounds from our conflicts with Reunion. We can't overlook them.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We could say we're willing to forgive, or beg forgiveness, but we have to think about those we lost, or who suffered.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Especially...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Reunion killed my friend. And we just killed someone you looked up to.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Hrm.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: I get it... I killed your family, didn't I?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: You can't forgive that.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: But you're Infected!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: If we don't let you in, we're disobeying orders.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Our current orders are to crush Talulah and her minions. And anyone who disobeys that order is to be killed.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: So you're letting it go? Can you... let it go?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Yes, you killed our family. You killed our commander, our leader, our Captain.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: But we're not going to come to blows over it.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: You don't want revenge?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Of course we do. I'm not done yet, let me finish, Feline!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: But whatever we've got between us personally doesn't matter in the face of the mission.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: There's a more important place to direct our hate.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Hate...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You get it, don't you, Feline? That Cautus with you is a kid with her head in the clouds, just like the Captain said.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Don't talk about Amiya like that.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: If you really buy into her dreams of reforming everybody, then by all means, go along with her.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: You'll get stabbed in the back, and you won't know until it's too late. You won't be able to save your friends. It all sounds good in theory, but you can't really put it into practice.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: And us, we believe in the Captain. All this way, he's shown us a different way, beyond the endless wars of Ursus.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: He showed us a noble path of revenge and ruin.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: A path of ruin?!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: To ruin our enemies.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: How to pick out your enemies and then ruin them.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: But who is your enemy? Can you really act like it's a good thing to spread hate, hurt people, start wars, and generally cause misery?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Haven't you lost enough friends? Didn't Ursus...?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The last emperor promised us an end to this war! We believed in that vision.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: But I don't see an end in you. Should we reason with them? They don't listen. Some people are asses, and some are just evil and need to die.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Listen to me, Feline!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: You won't get the satisfaction you want from killing your enemies. For the simple reason that that's not where it ends.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: If you're committed to that path, then take it all the way, kill everything, cleanse the country of its filth and when at last you look over the silent white field of snow... then you can finally know happiness!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Think about it. And then we start killing.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Kill the monster in the tower who sent our people to die, kill the tyrants who lord over the cities, kill the useless eaters, and the traitors in the army!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: And at last, kill the miserable Ursus ministers who poison the Emperor with their lies. Kill them all!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Then you look back and see what you've done! See those who deserved to live on, their peaceful lives, free from the fear of starvation being forced upon them.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: I mean, that's what you're doing here, right?
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: You kill those who kill your friends!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: You want to kill Talulah.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Obviously!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: What else would we want? Will the Captain ever be able to rest in peace as long as she lives? What about Yelena and her Yetis? Or the countless Reunion brothers who she used as cannon fodder?!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: We've been waiting for a savior, a good emperor, a hero... and we're sick of waiting.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: What did all that waiting get us?
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Our great Emperor is fallen, with no one to carry on his legacy, with greedy, self-interested men fighting over the scraps, ripping our country in two and milking the people dry!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Our savior was buried alive, and our hero died right in front of us!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Not that you would understand.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: But maybe you'll understand something else. Feline, have you ever lost a loved one?
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: I can see it in your eyes.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: I'm done talking to you.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: But you'll listen, Feline. You have the eyes of a warrior.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: The sealing layer is still rising...
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: It hasn't stopped at all.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: It'll take some time to adjust the Originium drive.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It better not take too long. If this thing seals up, then all the hope of a trial goes with it for at least a few hundred years.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: So you guerrillas don't just fight for the Infected.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Obviously!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: The Infected are just one reason to fight. You can have as many as you want!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: The one and only reason we took to the tundra was the injustice and disorder of Ursus. The Captain told us the Infected didn't have to live like this, it's Ursus that tortures the Infected to achieve their ends!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Picture it, our great march... the Captain brought us all here, could that really just be for the Infected?
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: We crossed from border to border, passing by all the hardened cities, taking control of the lifeblood of the Empire, uniting to strike at the heart of the rotten country...!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Don't tell me you've never considered it, Cautus? You're not like this just because you're Infected.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: If they treated everyone right, equally, maybe you wouldn't have even gotten infected.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Think about it, how many city dwellers, nobles, merchants, and performers get infected?
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: And then how many out in the wilderness, the outskirts, and the mines?
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: That's why we need to get revenge!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: On who?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Everyone who gets in our way!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: That's not right!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Don't you hate the people who made us what we are?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I'm not talking about righting the wrongs of the Infected! I mean it's wrong to turn this into like, a way to blow off steam, that's what's wrong...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: They did this to us, for their own sakes!
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: They turned us into monsters! And... and I hate them.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Preach, Feline.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: No...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...That's not right......
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'm sorry.
This is going to hurt.
I'm sorry... Amiya. This shouldn't have happened to you.
It's not right.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But... Amiya, why do you say that?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Don't you think we should hate them? You can't say they didn't steal our lives from us.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I don't want to forget... I don't want to forget my friends and family!
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I could have worn clothes I liked, and gone to the school I wanted. I could have gotten to know my mom and dad and everyone, I could have...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I could have... my brothers... *whimper*...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Rosmontis, calm... calm down!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I can't...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I can't.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I won't let this go, Amiya... I can't!
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: If I have to get hurt to protect them, if I have to suffer to keep them from suffering...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Then I'll take it all!
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: If killing the people who ruined our lives would make you all feel even a little better, and if you're not willing to do it, then let me do it for you!
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Rosmontis, Amiya, we've got a transmission from the engineer team!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Something weird's happening, the drive system isn't moving!
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: ...Is it the enemy? Captain, if you can hear me, this is...
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: No! They must be...
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: Captain! Look out for Ur—
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: Get back! Jump! Hurry!
attributes.name: Woman's Voice

attributes.content: What happened? Come in...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: ...Do you copy?! Lavaca! Bluishsilver!
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: No, no no no...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: The sealing layer is still rising!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: (Did the engineer team... get ambushed?)
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No, it can't be. Bluishsilver, she... I'll can't reach her, I can't feel her anymore!
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: ...Prepare the explosives. Let's blow the whole joint.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: If we destroy the sealing layer, it will take a few blocks with it. And there are still some Infected who didn't want to join Reunion hiding in the area!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: There's no time. If we keep waiting only more people will die!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: We've lost comms!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: If you don't like my plan then give us a better one!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: No.
Absolutely not.
No.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I get where you're coming from... I dunno. It's just...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: My team... my squad... I...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: They did everything right! How could this happen to them?!
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: If you need strength, if you need to destroy, I can do it! I can do it better!
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Rosmontis!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ah... ahhh!
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Rosmontis! Curl your fingers!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I just... tear... destroy...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Wha... the sealing layer's stopping?
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: I CAN DO IT!!!
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: An explosion?! No way. The Feline, she... how is she tearing that thing apart?
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: ...What... how...?
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: It's almost like...
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Shh!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: (Shakes his head)
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: It's just like the first time you saw FrostNova and Talulah, isn't it?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Just wait until our infections get worse... maybe you'll see some more.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: *Pant*, *pant*... I...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Amiya... I... I'm cold... My head...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Rosmontis! I've got you! Hold on tight, don't let go!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: She shredded the sealing layer all by herself?
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Not for long, but it should be enough to get us through the sector.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: I need a medic!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hnnngh... Aaugh! It's scratching me, scratching at me!
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: These are negative emotions and side effects of direct Arts... They all have to do with Bluishsilver's memories.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Rosmontis... Look at me. Look at my eyes!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (The black lines flow from the finger of the Lord of Fiends right into the Feline's eyes...)
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: (She really is...)
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Nnnngh... I know... Amiya... I know...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Don't ever do that again! B-But, even if I tell you, you'll...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Uh huh... S-Sorry... I won't change. Heh.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Well done, Feline! You really did it!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Brothers, let's move out! Through the fire and the hail of bolts, we go!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: You should rest here for a while, Rhodes Islanders.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Just give me a minute, guerrilla fighter?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We don't have a way to stay in communication. Even the operator with you there doesn't have the comms we need to carry out this operation.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If the Shieldguards really need our help... Then you have to know what we're going to do, at least.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Good thinking. Couldn't hurt to give you a minute.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Especially with all this little Feline did for us.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: (Breathes weakly)
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Rosmontis...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'll be fine. I have to... keep... fighting.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I have to... find... my team.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: ...Okay. I know.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's Madame Ch'en again...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: So you're really going back?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Definitely.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: But you told me you don't know if your friend in Ursus is alive or dead. What's the point in going back to Lungmen? Why not go right to Ursus after graduation, then?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Ursus wouldn't give someone like me an entry permit.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: No way... Oh, it's really so sad to see you go right after you finish. You're such a clever girl, Chenchen. You'd make senior lecturer in no time!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Give it two years and can go anywhere in the world you want, eh?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Don't ever call me that again, please.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: And what about you?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Me? You know me. I'm not stupid, but compared to you, well... I only eked out passing grades in those joint operations.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: You just finished your military strategy course?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Almost failed that one a bunch of times.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: You've got a better head on your shoulders than 98% of Victoria. At least on paper.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: But I don't see myself becoming a lecturer. I think I'm better off going looking for a fight than setting myself up as a command or logistics officer.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: You really don't fear death. A Victorian soldier can end up running into all sorts of things on the battlefield.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: But I know our enemies sure as hell don't wanna run into any Victorians soldiers on the battlefield.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: What I really worry about is sitting in front of a strategic map messing up my head till I can only see human lives as numbers. That's the scariest thing. A soldier on the front lines needs somebody to tell her what to do, and what not to do.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Only when you're in the thick of it do you see how cruel a war is, and how important it is to stop.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: You really want to change Victoria? I thought... that was just a drunken ramble.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Nah, not at all. Is it that weird? I just... want to do some good.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Doing good isn't easy.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: But it's the reason I'm going back to Lungmen. Lungmen's had enough of the bad. I'll stay there, fix up the bad things, stop it from getting worse.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: So you're going back to become a cop?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: A cop?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Wow. I always thought you had the look of a girl who could give a good beating to a hooligan. I've got a gift!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: You're getting ahead of yourself. But the police...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: That's not a bad idea.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: It'd probably be a great place to pick up clues about what happened back then, and what's happening now... I wouldn't have to rely on my old schemer of an uncle.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Honestly I was worried you'd head to military intelligence. My little Chenchen is scary enough, I can't imagine how scary she'd be as a spook.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: And I'll have your bloody head off.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Hey! No need to get angry. *Sigh* Alright, I can take it!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Hah. We'll see how much you can take.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Oh, someone's at the door. Just a sec! Coming!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Message for Miss Ch'en Hui-chieh, post-transcribed. Check your terminal. I have to confirm in person that you've read it yourself.
attributes.name: Academy Messenger

attributes.content: Why all the trouble? I'll take a look.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: ...What? What... is this?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I'd say that counts as you having received the message. The academy doesn't review highly classified material, so if you have any further inquiries about the content, I'll advise you to reply to the sender.
attributes.name: Academy Messenger

attributes.content: Anything else I can do for you? If that's all, I'll be on my way. Have a good afternoon.
attributes.name: Academy Messenger

attributes.content: There we go.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Why do they walk so funny?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I don't like the look of your face there. Did that message sock you in the jaw?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I don't even know what I'm feeling.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: They picked up my friend's trail.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Well isn't that good?!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: It just led to her disappearing again. She...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: She... killed the one who took her. And then... we lost her again.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Erm.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: But at least... she's still alive?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: That's true.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I'm going right back to Lungmen after graduation.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Huh? But... well, isn't your friend in Ursus? I really thought you'd be heading that way. I was thinking of knitting you a few scarves as a goodbye gift.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I wouldn't be able to do much in Ursus. But back in Lungmen, I'll have a chance to spread my influence. The city of Lungmen is a lot stronger than me alone.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: ...I am going to find her.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: 'As move at teardrop's point, once known be deft.'
